Comment: There’s another angle here in that it’s DC, the city housing thousands if not tens of thousands of federal employees who just got let go. Early in February a bill was introduced to end DC home rule.   Everyone’s looking at this summer being a big protest summer when students can join those laid off workers. Add in people pissed at rising prices and DC is going to be a likely flashpoint for anything that happens.
